book.synopsis: With unparalleled wit, clarity, and intelligence, Richard Dawkins, one of the world

s Tale, Dawkins offers a masterwork: an exhilarating reverse tour through evolution, from present-day humans back to the microbial beginnings of life four billion years ago. Throughout the journey Dawkins spins entertaining, insightful stories and sheds light on topics such as speciation, sexual selection, and extinction. The Ancestor
s Tale: A Pilgrimage to the Dawn of Evolution

s Tale: A Pilgrimage to the Dawn of Evolution
